name: @rapid/tui
description: Terminal UI renderer for Rapid framework - build beautiful CLI apps

scripts.build: bunup src/index.ts src/jsx-runtime.ts --format esm --dts --target node --splitting=false --external @rapid/router-core --external @rapid/runtime --external @rapid/signal --external @rapid/tui/jsx-runtime --external chalk --external cli-boxes --external string-width --external strip-ansi --external yoga-wasm-web --external slice-ansi
scripts.build:watch: bunup src/index.ts src/jsx-runtime.ts --format esm --dts --target node --splitting=false --watch --external @rapid/router-core --external @rapid/runtime --external @rapid/signal --external @rapid/tui/jsx-runtime --external chalk --external cli-boxes --external string-width --external strip-ansi --external yoga-wasm-web --external slice-ansi
